remarks: The algebra scalars function is a function into the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
asclf.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
asclf.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
asclf.r $e |- ( ph -> W e. Ring ) $.
asclf.l $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
asclf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
asclf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
asclf $p |- ( ph -> A : K --> B ) $.
